trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The sahuagin has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it must be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating outside water.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The sahuagin can magically control sharks within 120 feet of itself, using a special telepathy.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sahuagin makes two Spectral Jaws attacks.

action.name: Spectral Jaws
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) Force damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sahuagin casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):

spellcasting.name: Fiendish Aid (2/Day)
headerEntries: The sahuagin casts {@spell Bless|XPHB} or {@spell Healing Word|XPHB}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.
